remarks: The orthocomplement of a kernel is an atom iff it is nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2014.)
statement:
dochkrsat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochkrsat.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochkrsat.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochkrsat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
dochkrsat.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
dochkrsat.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
dochkrsat.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochkrsat.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochkrsat.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
dochkrsat $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) =/= { .0. } <-> ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) e. A ) ) $.
